name: Life is Strange - Episode 4: Dark Room
name_original: Life is Strange - Episode 4: Dark Room
description:
Life is Strange - Episode 4: Dark Room is an adventure game developed by DONTNOD Entertainment. It came out on 28-07-2015. It was published by Square Enix. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Life is Strange - Episode 4: Dark Room is available on PC.
